data.comment: The first-half is under way at Pride Park Stadium - Derby County kick-off to start the match.
Derby County take a 1-0 lead thanks to Martyn Waghorn.
In the minute 45, Oliver Langford blows to end the first-half.
Cardiff kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Derby County make their first substitution with Craig Forsyth replacing Nathan Byrne.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Will Vaulks with Robert Glatzel. This is the first substitution made today by Neil Harris.
Goal! Kieffer Moore levels the match at 1-1.
Phillip Cocu is making the team's second substitution at Pride Park Stadium with Mike te Wierik replacing Lee Buchanan.
In the minute 82, Kamil Jozwiak (Derby County) gets a yellow card.
Sean Morrison is booked for the away team.
Kazim is on a sub for Tom Lawrence for Derby County.
In the minute 86, Derby County's Graeme Shinnie has been booked in Derby.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Mike te Wierik (Derby County) has received a yellow card from Oliver Langford.
Sheyi Ojo (Cardiff) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
